column5: Should this AI use case be withheld from public reporting?
column7: Is the AI use case high-impact?
column11: What problem is the AI intended to solve?
column12: What are the expected benefits and positive outcomes from the AI for an agency’s mission and/or the general public?
column14: Date when AI use case became operational or the pilot’s start date
column15: Was the system involved in this use case purchased from a vendor or developed under contract(s) or in-house?
column17: Does this AI use case have an associated Authorization to Operate (ATO)?
column19: Describe any data used to  train, fine-tune, and/or  evaluate performance of the  model(s) used in this use  case.
column20: If the data is required to be  publicly disclosed as an  open government data asset,  provide a link to the entry on the Federal Data Catalog.
column21: Does this AI use case  involve personally  identifiable information (PII)  that is maintained by the  agency?
column22: If publicly available, provide  the link to the AI use case’s associated Privacy Impact Assessment (PIA).
column23: Which, if any, demographic  variables does the AI use  case explicitly use as model  features?
column24: Does this project include  custom-developed code?
column25: If the code is open source, provide the link for the  publicly available source  code.
column26:
Has pre-deployment testing been conducted for this AI  use case? 




Practice: Complete AI Impact Assessment
column27:
Has an AI impact assessment been completed for this AI use case? 



Practice: Complete AI Impact Assessment
column28:
What are the potential  impacts of using the AI for  this particular use case and  how were they identified?    



Subpractice: Complete AI  Impact Assessment
column29:
Has as independent review  of the AI use case been  conducted?    




Sub practice Complete AI  Impact Assessment
column30:
Is there a process to conduct
ongoing monitoring to
identify any adverse impacts
to the performance and
security of the AI functionality, as well as to privacy, civil rights, and civil liberties?

Practice: Conduct Ongoing Monitoring for Performance and Potential Adverse Impacts
column31:
Has the agency established sufficient and periodic  training for operators of the  AI to interpret and act on the  its output and managed associated risks?


Practice: Ensure Adequate Human Training and Assessment
column32:
Does this AI use case have an appropriate fail-safe that minimizes the risk of significant harm?





Practice: Provide Additional Human Oversight, Intervention, and Accountability
column33:
Is there an established appeal process in the event that an impacted individual would like to appeal or  contest the AI system’s  outcome?


Practice: Offer Consistent Remedies or Appeals
column34:
What steps has the agency taken to consult and incorporate feedback from end users of this AI use case and the public?




Practice: Consult and Incorporate Feedback from End Users and the Public
